name: Tetronimeow
description:
A small metroidbrania made for the Thinky Games Are For Everyone" jam.

Finished in quite a rush, but any problems should be pretty minor. In case anything goes haywire, let me know and refresh the page - the game saves your progress at checkpoints.

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to move

Q/E, W/S, Up/Down arrows to rotate

Click on a body part to set your pivot point

Click on buttons in the right-hand toolbar to flip and change shapes (once you unlock them!)

M to mute audio
